descriptionlist.description: SimplyFlat11 was designed to be simple, flat and work in iOS 11.
The theme was created since there were two apps on my phone that were not already themed and so, I wanted to make my own theme.

SimplyFlat11 has icons for:
The Weather Network
PUBG Mobile
Pocket Planes
Calculator
App Store
Twitter
Discord
MLB At Bat
Twitch
and more to come!

screenshot.description: This is a description for screenshot 1. It's Cydia!
This is a description for screenshot 2. It's another Cydia!

changelog.change: added some new icons including: twitter, pocket planes, discord, MLB at bat, and twitch
also made an alt theme for the twicth icon
